title: A Love Worth Saving
description: Maria's marriage has become stale and boring but her new boss, gorgeous Mark Bronson, seems more than willing to help spice up her love life. Torn between loyalty to her husband and family and her desire to live for the moment, Maria must make some difficult choices.If she decides to have an affair with her boss, will he really love her the way she deserves? Will he help her gain the promotion she desperately wants?If she decides to stay with her husband, can she bring her ailing marriage back to life?'A Love Worth Saving?' is a story of love, lust, life and one woman's quest for happiness amid the complex demands of the modern world.
author: R.P. Rochford
